title: pAlayamAm brhadIshvara
sahitya:
pAlayamAm brhadIshvara pAlita bhuvanEshvara


anupallavi

 vilasita tanjapurIshvara brhannAyakI manOhara


caraNam   dInajanAvana shankara divAkarAgni shashi nEtrA 
dAnava sura sEvita varadAna nipuNa mahEshvara 
gAna vidhyApradEshvara mAnitaguruguha sOdara 
sannutAnandakara paramEshvara shubhakara hara hara
